Dev Environment

  • wsl version 1 for minimal linux tools wsl integrates nicely and you can run commands like git, make, gcc by doing 
      wsl gcc
  wsl make
  wsl git clone https://git-repo

    There is an added step, in the distro, at etc/wsl.conf

      [automount]
  options = "metadata"
